title: Sunset Limited Timetable
heading: Amtrak's Sunset Limited
bottom_text:
MST Mountain Standard Time
Arizona does not observe Daylight Savings Time. Please double-check all Arizona calling times when spring and fall clock changes occur in other states.

Note: At San Antonio, cars from Chicago connect to the Sunset Limited for service to Los Angeles. See the Texas Eagle timetable.

Local connecting trains are provided:
at New Orleans, streetcars by NORTA,
at Tucson by Sun Link Streetcar,
at Ontario, Pomona, and Los Angeles by Metrolink,
and at Los Angeles by LA Metro.
